CustomField.formula: CASE(Badge_Item_Count__c,5,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024Adb", "Healthy Start"), 6,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024Adb", "Healthy Start"), 7,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024Adl", "Health Guru" ), 8,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024Adl", "Health Guru" ), 9,IMAGE("https://isn--c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000024Adv&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1438095764000", "Health Nut" ), 10,IMAGE("https://isn--c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015340000024Adv&oid=00DL0000005xuC6&lastMod=1438095764000", "Health Nut" ), IMAGE("https://isn--c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01534000002D9Pb","Couch Potato"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Badges are earned by checklist items that are added after July 1, 2015. If a badge is displayed in Salesforce and no name is present in Awarded To field, the badge was earned prior to July 1, 2015.
CustomField.label: Healthy Account Badge Status
